context.description: This operator provides support for analysis of incoming tuple data against Apache Spark's collaborative filtering machine learning library.

parameter.name: analysisType
parameter.description: The type of analysis to perform using the collaborative filtering algorithm.

parameter.name: attr1
parameter.description: The attribute to be used to provide the first input value to the analytics model.

parameter.name: attr2
parameter.description: The attribute to be used to provide the second input value to the analytics model.

parameter.name: modelPath
parameter.description: The path containing the persisted analytic model

parameter.name: params
parameter.description: The parameters to be passed to the spark configuration as a comma-separated list of 'key=value'

parameter.name: sparkMaster
parameter.description: The spark master to use during the analysis. If not specified, the default value is 'local'

inputPortSet.description: This input port is required. The operator expects 2 attributes of type int32 that will be used as input to the collaborative filtering algorithm.

outputPortSet.description: This output port is required. The operator passes through all attributes on the input port as-is to the output port. In addition, it expects an attribute called 'analysisResult' of type list<float64> or float64 depending on the 'analysisType' parameter.
